verses.verse: After this I looked and, behold, a door opened in heaven, and the first voice that I heard, kind of like a trumpet, talking to me, saying, "Come up here, and I will show you things which must happen after this".
Immediately I was in spirit and look, a throne was set in heaven and one sitting on the throne.
And the one sitting there had an appearance similar to jasper and sardius, and a rainbow surrounded the throne, which had an appearance similar to emerald.
And around the throne [were] twenty-four thrones, and on the thrones I saw twenty-four elders sitting adorned in white clothes, and they had gold crowns on their heads.
Flashes of light, thunders, and voices came from the throne, and [there were] seven flaming lamps of fire in front of the throne, which are the seven spirits of God.
Also in front of the throne [there was] a sea of glass similar to crystal, and in the midst of the throne, around the throne [were] four living creatures, covered with eyes in front and back.
The first living creature looked like a lion, the second living creature like a calf, the third living creature like a man, and the fourth living creature like a flying eagle.

The four living creatures each had six wings around [them] covered with eyes on the inner surface. They do not pause day or night saying, "Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, which was, which is, which is to come".
When these living creatures offer praise, honor, and thanksgiving to him who sits on the throne, who lives forever and ever,
the twenty-four elders drop down before him who sits on the throne and worship him who lives forever and ever. They lay their crowns in front of the throne saying,
"You are worthy, O Lord, to receive praise, honor, and power, because you have created everything, and they are and were created your pleasure."
